text: læa khea hela nan klaw wa fi nrk nan ca mi tæatxng phwk rea ley nxkcak brrda wan thi thuk nab di cng klaw theid (muhammad) wa than thanghlay di yudthux khaman sayya n thi xallxhˌ doy thi xallxhˌ ca mi thrng phid sayya khxng phraxngkh ley kranan hrux? Hrux wa phwk than xuplokn khwam thec khun hı kæ xallxhˌ nı sing thi phwk than miru
